heading: Today
text: Patchy valley fog early, then sunny and near-record warmth.Upper 70s and 80s

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly clear, then increasing clouds.  Very mild.

heading: Tuesday
text: Sun giving way to clouds. Afternoon showers north and west.70s to near 80.

heading: Wednesday
text: Showers ending north to south, following by some afternoon clearing. Colder.50s to mid 60s
